00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using Niry;
00024 using Niry.Utils;
00025 
00026 using System;
00027 using System.IO;
00028 using System.Text;
00029 using System.Collections;
00030 using System.Text.RegularExpressions;
00031 
00032 namespace NyFolder.GUI {
00034     public static class Dnd {
00035         // ============================================
00036         // PUBLIC Events
00037         // ============================================
00038 
00039         // ============================================
00040         // PROTECTED Members
00041         // ============================================
00042 
00043         // ============================================
00044         // PRIVATE Members
00045         // ============================================
00046         private static TargetEntry[] dndTargetTable = new TargetEntry[] {
00047             new TargetEntry("TEXT", 0, 0),
00048             new TargetEntry("STRING", 0, 1),
00049             new TargetEntry("text/plain", 0, 2),
00050             new TargetEntry("text/uri-list", 0, 3),
00051             new TargetEntry("_NETSCAPE_URL", 0, 4),
00052             new TargetEntry("application/x-color", 0, 5),
00053             new TargetEntry("application/x-rootwindow-drop", 0, 6),
00054             new TargetEntry("property/bgimage", 0, 7),
00055             new TargetEntry("property/keyword", 0, 8),
00056             new TargetEntry("x-special/gnome-icon-list", 0, 9),
00057             new TargetEntry("x-special/gnome-reset-background", 0, 10)
00058         };
00059 
00060         // ============================================
00061         // PUBLIC Methods
00062         // ============================================
00063 
00065         public static string[] GetDragReceivedUris (DragDataReceivedArgs args) {
00066             string uris = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(args.SelectionData.Data);
00067             return(Regex.Split(uris, "\r\n"));
00068         }
00069 
00071         public static object[] GetDragReceivedPaths (DragDataReceivedArgs args) {
00072             string[] uris = GetDragReceivedUris(args);
00073 
00074             ArrayList pathList = ArrayList.Synchronized(new ArrayList());
00075             foreach (string uri in uris) {
00076                 string path = uri.Trim();
00077 
00078                 // Continue, if Null Path is Found
00079                 if (path == null || path == "" || path.Length <= 0 || path == String.Empty || path[0] == 0)
00080                     continue;
00081 
00082                 // Parse Path...
00083                 if (path.StartsWith("file://") == true) {
00084                     if (Environment.OSVersion.Platform != PlatformID.Unix) {
00085                         // Windows: file:///D:/Prova
00086                         path = path.Substring(8);
00087                     } else {
00088                         // Unix: file:///home/
00089                         path = path.Substring(7);
00090                     }
00091                 }
00092 
00093                 // Replace % Tags:
00094                 path = UrlUtils.UrlDecode(path);
00095 
00096                 // Add Path To List
00097                 pathList.Add(path);
00098             }
00099 
00100             return(pathList.ToArray());
00101         }
00102 
00103         // ============================================
00104         // PRIVATE Methods
00105         // ============================================
00106 
00107         // ============================================
00108         // PUBLIC Properties
00109         // ============================================
00111         public static TargetEntry[] TargetTable {
00112             get { return(dndTargetTable); }
00113         }
00114     }
00115 }
